text: Gustavo Lino Adrianzén Olaya (born 25 October 1966) is a Peruvian lawyer and politician. He has been the prime minister of Peru since March 2024. He was the 26th Permanent Representative of Peru to the Organization of American States from 2023 to 2024. He also was the Minister of Justice and Human Rights under former President Ollanta Humala from April to October 2015. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Peru Category:Peruvian lawyers
title: Gustavo Adrianzén
